title: Geographical analysis of fluoride and nitrate and its probabilistic health risk assessment utilizing Monte Carlo simulation and GIS in potable water in rural areas of Mathura region, Uttar Pradesh, northern India
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Shahjad Ali, Salman Ahmad, Mohammad Usama, Raisul Islam, Azhar Shadab, Rajesh Kumar Deolia, Jitendra Kumar, Ayoob Rastegar, Ali Akbar Mohammadi, Shadab Khurshid, Vahide Oskoei, Seyed Alireza Nazari
